present.title: POS / mPOS
present.desc: Physical terminals for card-present transactions, enabling secure payment processing.

present.title: Tap to Phone
present.desc: Innovative white-label application for contactless payments, using a smartphone or tablet to achieve faster, smoother, and frictionless checkout.

present.title: Agent Network
present.desc: Expand your reach with an affiliate merchant network that allows users to make payments, withdrawals, deposits, and more, providing financial access in strategic locations.

notPresent.title: E-commerce Gateway
notPresent.desc: Facilitates online payments quickly and securely, integrating multiple payment methods and offering advanced management tools to enhance your digital business.

notPresent.title: Mobile Wallet
notPresent.desc: Provides multiple ways to complete payments, from QR codes scanned by the app to NFC and value-added solutions like loyalty, bill payments, reporting, and more.

notPresent.title: QR Generator
notPresent.desc: Generates static and dynamic QR codes for your merchants, customizable through user-friendly interfaces for seamless payments.

notPresent.title: Tokenization
notPresent.desc: Protects sensitive data in unique identifiers that cannot be exploited outside the system, ensuring secure transactions and reducing the risk of fraud in digital payments.

valueAdded.title: CloseLoop
valueAdded.desc: Digitalize and control your internal processes with traceability, flow authorization, and centralized management. A solution for companies that need order, efficiency, and real-time visibility.

valueAdded.title: Recurring Billing Engine
valueAdded.desc: Enables billing management for merchants, serving as a tool for monthly, weekly, or daily collections.
